Yellow bike club!

Andy, Carolyn, and company visited us from portland! Yesterday we went on a fun ebike food tour on a bright sunny day around my neighborhood and today we went mountain biking in the pouring rain.

Mattie would like the blog to know that biking in the rain gave her a cold and she basically has pneumonia now. Don't worry she has slight sniffles.
